TopicTitle: Kickstarter to crowdfund a space telescope!

Articles.Content:
Now we can directly fund space research mm asteroid detection and exoplanets. Stretch goals include space selfies, images of bodies of your choice, and membership of the Planetary Society.

www.kickstarter.com/projects/1458134548/arkyd-a-space-telescope-for-everyone-0/posts/506461

Already posted several times here:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/32670-Check-this-out!-Kickstarter-has-a-Publicly-Operated-Space-Telescope-Project

We don't really need a new thread on this every week.
